snippet.title: Sega Genesis - Road Rash II (1991)
snippet.description: One of the best racing games of the 16-bit era. The Road Rash series was unique because it was both a racing game and a beat-em-up rolled into 1. Even if you don't win, at least you got to punch someone at 120 mph.
